# `xmap` crossmaps for data integration in R

xmap provides tools for creating, validating and modifying Nomenclature Crossmaps for use in Data Integration and Harmonisation workflows (i.e. in `{conformr}`).

## Installation

To install the latest development version of `conformr`:

``` r
remotes::install_github("cynthiahqy/conformr-project", subdir = "xmap")
```
